newsitem.title: UK: NWE OIL PRODUCTS STABLE TO FIRMER.
newsitem.headline: NWE OIL PRODUCTS STABLE TO FIRMER.

text.p: NWE oil products were steady to firmer on Tuesday, traders said.
Gasoline was steady to slightly firmer, but business was very slow. The tight Med was giving some support.

High sulphur fuel oil barges were steady to higher, trading between $94.50 and $95.50 fob ARA, as prompt material was in short supply. Cargoes were talked steady at $84/85 fob with two prospective buyers on the market.
Gas oil was 50 cents to $1 firmer but business was quiet with most players focussing on the August IPE contract, which last traded at $168.50 before expiry.
